display_name: Remote Services: Distributed Component Object Model

atomic_tests.name: PowerShell Lateral Movement using MMC20
atomic_tests.description:
Powershell lateral movement using the mmc20 application com object.

Reference:

https://blog.cobaltstrike.com/2017/01/24/scripting-matt-nelsons-mmc20-application-lateral-movement-technique/

Upon successful execution, cmd will spawn calc.exe on a remote computer.

atomic_tests.name: PowerShell Lateral Movement Using Excel Application Object
atomic_tests.description:
Powershell lateral movement using the Excel COM objects.

Reference:

https://posts.specterops.io/lateral-movement-abuse-the-power-of-dcom-excel-application-3c016d0d9922

Upon successful execution, cmd will spawn calc.exe on a remote computer.

dependencies.get_prereq_command: Write-Host "You will need to install Microsoft Excel manually to meet this requirement"
